title: Bug 50550: PropFind 404 error after MkCol success
OB: When executing a PropFind call on a resource after executing a MkCol call for the same resource, a 404 error is returned.
EB: The caching issue causing the PropFind 404 error after MkCol success needs to be investigated and resolved.
SR:
1. Investigate the caching issue that causes the 404 error.
2. Fix the caching problem to ensure that a PropFind call works correctly after a MkCol call on the same resource.
